resources.string:
1. Look on the map to find bugs near you.

 2. Get within 100ft of a bug to catch it.

 3. Caught bugs are added to your collection. Click on one to study it with Augmented Reality!
You won\'t be able to collect bugs if you don\'t allow access to your location
Select a marker first, then click on directions
No bugs yet.\n Go to the map tab to find some.
Notifications sent when a bug is available for download
It looks like this bug has left.
You need internet connection to see the bug in AR.
The most distinctive feature of the stag beetle is its long antler-like pincers which protrude from the head.
The common or green anaconda is the largest snake in the world by weight, and the second longest.
Its scientific name is Coccinellidae which is derived from the Latin word coccineus meaning \"scarlet\"
Wasps native to North America are commonly referred to as hornets but are actually yellowjackets, their close relatives.
We can\'t find where you are if you don\'t allow access to your location
